thread.title: Cameron Diaz's Date Night Turns Embarrassing, Trips Outside Restaurant
thread.title_full: Cameron Diaz's Date Night Turns Embarrassing, Trips Outside Restaurant

title: Cameron Diaz's Date Night Turns Embarrassing, Trips Outside Restaurant
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Cameron Diaz faced an embarrassing moment when she was coming out of Los Angeles hot spot, The Nice Guy. 'The Other Woman' actress was caught up by the rare storm in Los Angeles on Saturday night. While leaving from The Nice Guy, the actress was stepping into her car with husband, Benji Madden holding her hand. 
However, her pumps slipped in the wet floor and she ended up slipping over. 
While crossing the sidewalk to enter inside the Uber, Cameron Diaz slipped outside The Nice Guy in West Hollywood. 
Luckily, her knight in shining armour which is none other than her husband, Benji Madden came to the rescue and saved her from facing the worst and getting hurt. 
The 36-year-old dotting husband held Cameron from behind and helped her stand back on her feet. 
Cameron looked gorgeous and bright in a leopard print shift dress. Benji, who showed off a new head tattoo, looked dapper in black. 
The date night might have been romantic but Cameron's tripping was a little embarrassing for the 'Annie' star. However, Benji like a true gentleman was at her aid to help her get back and enter inside the car.
